001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
008import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010
011import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
012
013/**
014 * A simple service locator for initialization purposes and external services provided by
015 * plugins. <strong> If there is no suitable <code>name</code> for the service use
016 * {@value #DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME}. </strong>
017 */
018public sealed interface ServiceRegistry extends AutoCloseable permits DefaultServiceRegistry {
019
020        /**
021         * Services that do not have multiple options or need a default should use
022         * {@value #DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME}.
023         */
024        static final String DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME = LogProperties.DEFAULT_NAME;
025
026        /**
027         * Creates an empty service registry.
028         * @return registry.
029         */
030        public static ServiceRegistry of() {
031                return new DefaultServiceRegistry();
032        }
033
034        /**
035         * Puts a service.
036         * @param <T> service type.
037         * @param type type.
038         * @param name name of service.
039         * @param service service instance.
040         */
041        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, String name, T service);
042
043        /**
044         * Puts a service.
045         * @param <T> service type.
046         * @param type type.
047         * @param service service instance.
048         */
049        default <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service) {
050                put(type, DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME, service);
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Puts a service if absent.
055         * @param <T> service type.
056         * @param type type.
057         * @param name name of the service.
058         * @param supplier service instance.
059         * @return service.
060         */
061        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, String name, Supplier<T> supplier);
062
063        /**
064         * Puts a service if absent.
065         * @param <T> service type.
066         * @param type type.
067         * @param supplier service instance.
068         * @return service.
069         */
070        default <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier) {
071                return putIfAbsent(type, DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME, supplier);
072        }
073
074        /**
075         * Finds a service or null.
076         * @param <T> service type
077         * @param type service class.
078         * @param name name of service.
079         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
080         */
081        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
082        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name);
083
084        /**
085         * Finds a service with the default name of {@value #DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME} or null.
086         * @param <T> service type
087         * @param type service class.
088         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
089         */
090        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
091        default <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type) {
092                return findOrNull(type, DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME);
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * Finds <strong>all</strong> services of a specific type.
097         * @param <T> service type.
098         * @param type service class.
099         * @return list of services.
100         */
101        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type);
102
103        /**
104         * Add a closeable to close on close in LIFO order.
105         * @param closeable closeable.
106         */
107        public void onClose(AutoCloseable closeable);
108
109        @Override
110        public void close();
111
112}
113
114record ServiceKey(Class<?> type, String name) {
115        ServiceKey {
116                Objects.requireNonNull(type);
117                Objects.requireNonNull(name);
118        }
119}
120
121interface PluginProvider<T, E extends Exception> {
122
123        public T provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws E;
124
125}
126
127abstract class ProviderRegistry<T extends PluginProvider<U, E>, U, E extends Exception> {
128
129        protected final Map<String, T> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
130
131        public void register(String scheme, T provider) {
132                providers.put(scheme, provider);
133        }
134
135}
136
137final class DefaultServiceRegistry implements ServiceRegistry {
138
139        private final Map<ServiceKey, Object> services = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
140
141        private final CopyOnWriteArrayList<AutoCloseable> closeables = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
142
143        @Override
144        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, String name, T service) {
145                if (service == null) {
146                        throw new NullPointerException("service");
147                }
148                services.putIfAbsent(new ServiceKey(type, name), service);
149        }
150
151        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
152        @Override
153        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name) {
154                Objects.requireNonNull(type, "type");
155                Objects.requireNonNull(name, "name");
156                return (T) services.get(new ServiceKey(type, name));
157        }
158
159        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
160        @Override
161        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type) {
162                return services.entrySet().stream().filter(e -> e.getKey().type() == type).map(e -> (T) e.getValue()).toList();
163        }
164
165        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
166        @Override
167        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, String name, Supplier<T> supplier) {
168                var t = (T) services.computeIfAbsent(new ServiceKey(type, name), k -> Objects.requireNonNull(supplier.get()));
169                return t;
170        }
171
172        @Override
173        public void onClose(AutoCloseable closeable) {
174                closeables.addIfAbsent(closeable);
175        }
176
177        @Override
178        public void close() {
179                for (var c : closeables.reversed()) {
180                        try {
181                                c.close();
182                        }
183                        catch (Exception e) {
184                                MetaLog.error(ServiceRegistry.class,
185                                                "Failure trying to close service registry closeable: " + c.getClass().getName(), e);
186                        }
187                }
188        }
189
190}
